item.title: GSoC'21 : Final Report
item.description: Name : Mohd Jeeshan Sheikh Organization : NumFOCUS Mentors : Chris Rackauckas, Kanav gupta, Yingbo Ma Project : Discretizations of Partial Differential Equations

item.title: GSoC'21 : Last Mile
item.description: Closing in Coding Period Hello to Everyone! Into the final couple weeks of my journey at GSoC'21, I’ve tried accomplishing the remaining couple of proposed goals of mine.

item.title: GSoC'21 : JuliaCon '21 & 8 Weeks done!
item.description: JuliaCon ‘21 Ola Amigos! I’m super-excited to tell you guys that I attended my first JuliaCon this year!! This is basically a Julia organized conference where people working in the Julia Community come together and give a briefing about the latest advancements, milestones and future prospects the organization looks up to.

item.title: GSoC'21 : Moving Ahead
item.description: Cache efficiency Hello Everyone! Some good news, the first evaluations happened from 12th-16th of July and I aced them! Last time I demonstrated my first sub-goal (Vector Calculus Operators) and how my next task was to optimize the code.

item.title: GSoC'21 : Approaching the First Evaluations
item.description: Vector Calculus Operators Hey guys! It has been some time since I last updated you since the community bonding period. Well, I’ve been pretty busy diving in some exciting stuff :P.

item.title: Commencing GSoC'21 with NumFOCUS
item.description: GSoC'21 : NumFOCUS In response to my contributions for about 4 months to SciML Org, I was absolutely thrilled when informed about my selection in this year’s GSoC on 17th May, 2021.
